messages.title: Three positive reasons to vote for Amanda Harvie
messages.content: I promise to give you a powerful and respected voice at the heart of David Cameron’s Conservative government. I am an advisor to the Conservative Party and have a deep understanding of the changes that Aberdeen and its citizens and businesses need to thrive and prosper. I promise to provide strong and effective leadership within Aberdeen. I will bring to-gether trusted friends from across the city and the political spectrum, to raise ambition and secure investment for Aberdeen – just as I have achieved before. As your MP, I promise I will listen to you and act on your concerns. I also promise to uphold the highest standards of professionalism and integrity in everything I do to represent you - in the same way that I have done throughout my career.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I promise to provide strong and effective leadership within Aberdeen. I will bring together trusted friends from across the city and the political spectrum, to raise ambition and secure investment for Aberdeen.
As your MP, I promise I will listen to you and act on your concerns. I also promise to uphold the highest standards of professionalism and integrity in everything I do to represent you.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been closely associated with Aberdeen since I first moved to the city in 1992. I am a former chief executive of Aberdeen and Grampian Chamber of Commerce and previously served as Grampian regional manager of The Prince’s Scottish Youth Business Trust. I have a strong track record of successfully championing the interests of Aberdeen, Aberdeen’s people and Aberdeen’s economy. I continually strive to be a force for positive change in everything I do, and am pleased to be known for my drive, commitment, professionalism and integrity.

politicalExperience.role: Former chief executive of Aberdeen and Grampian Chamber of Commerce
politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully championing the interests of Aberdeen, Aberdeen’s people and Aberdeen’s economy.

politicalExperience.role: Grampian regional manager of The Prince’s Scottish Youth Business Trust

images.caption: Picture of the candidate, Amanda Harvie.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet has been promoted by J. Irvine on behalf of A. Harvie, both at an address in Aberdeen. Printed by Treehouse Print, Edinburgh.
